pr_title: Issue #8657: Modification of javadoc example markers to support metadata generation - regexp

timeline.message: minor: edit javadodc example marker for metadata-gen - regexp

timeline.bodyText:
this one a bit more complicated ...
please add To configure the default check and add default example as we did gsoc-first-issue.
timeline.author: romani

replies.bodyText: There are various example configs already present in the lines below. This line is just used for signifying the start of examples section.
replies.author: gaurabdg

replies.bodyText: ok, let it be, we will address it later
replies.author: romani
